citation.article-title: Marmoricola bigeumensis sp. nov., a member of the family Nocardioidaceae.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Marmoricola bigeumensis sp. nov.
Marmoricola bigeumensis (big.e.um.en′sis. N.L. masc. adj. bigeumensis pertaining to Bigeum Island, Korea, from where the type strain was isolated).
Gram-positive, strictly aerobic, non-spore-forming, motile cocci, measuring 0.3–0.5 μm in diameter.
Cells are spherical, occurring singly.
Colonies are entire, convex, lemon yellow pigmented, shiny and smooth.
Old cultures (30–45 days) become rough and irregular shaped.
Catalase- and oxidase-negative.
Nitrate is reduced to nitrite.
No acid production is observed from l-arabinose, cellobiose, d-galactose, d-glucose, lactose, maltose, d-mannitol, d-mannose, raffinose, l-rhamnose, d-ribose or d-xylose.
Casein and gelatin are not hydrolysed.
Tyrosine and xanthine are decomposed.
Aesculin and Tween 80 are hydrolysed, but DNA is not.
Grows in the presence of 7 % NaCl (w/v).
No growth is observed below 20 °C or above 37 °C.

In the API ZYM system, tests for alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C4), esterase lipase (C8), leucine arylamidase, cystine arylamidase, trypsin, α-chymotrypsin, acid phosphatase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase, α-glucosidase and β-glucosidase are positive.
Activities of lipase (C14), valine arylamidase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase are negative.
The cell-wall peptidoglycan contains ll-2,6-diaminopimelic acid as the diagnostic diamino acid in the cell wall.
Phospholipids are phosphatidylinositol, diphosphatidylglycerol, phosphatidylglycerol and an unknown lipid.
The major menaquinone is MK-8(H4).
The predominant cellular fatty acids are i-C16 : 0 (59.05 %), ai-C17 : 0 (6.89 %), C16 : 0 (4.0 %) and i-C14 : 0 (3.29 %).
The DNA G+C content is 72.9 mol%.
The type strain, MSL-05T (=KCTC 19287T=DSM 19426T), was isolated from a soil sample from Bigeum Island, Republic of Korea.
